blog.title: Blog
blog.content: Here is a summary of the articles I write periodically on the DEV platform where I share my thoughts, discoveries and feedback. Feel free to take a look and leave comments and suggestions!

about_me.title: About me
about_me.introduction:
Hi, I'm Pierre Bouillon, a french software engineer from Luxembourg.

Curious and empathetic by nature, I enjoy experimenting things on my own and share them with others through articles, teaching or simply talking.

I currently am working with .NET and Angular as a technological stack even though I also enjoy using Svelte and discover new technologies.
